Caption: Dr. P. Subbarayan (Union Minister of Transport and Communications) hands over a prize to Mr. Ram Prakash Shetty.
Description: The Chief Guest, Dr. P. Subbarayan (Union Minister of Transport and Communication) distributed a number of prizes to students and faculty members at the Third Institute Day. The Institute Day of IIT Madras is a day marked to celebrate the hard work and success of certain people who have shown excellence in academics as well as extracurricular activities. In the image, Dr. P. Subbarayan hands over a prize to Mr. Ram Prakash Shetty. The people in the image were identified by Mr. K. Narayanan, Mr. C.V. Sahasranamam and Mr. Anand Singh Bawa.
